participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with Jesus, as I would love to learn more about his teachings and how they can be applied to my life.
I miss my family but I'm grateful for their support.
My spouse is a stay-at-home parent, and they do a great job of taking care of our children and our home.
i have my own greenhouse.
i live in pittsburgh.

participant_2.background:
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date!
I love starting my day with a swim.
i have woman calling me all the time.
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thank you! What's something exciting going on in your life right now?
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date!
That sounds exciting! I've never been to a Renaissance Faire, but I've heard they're a lot of fun.
They are! I love the atmosphere and the people watching.
I can imagine! Do you have a favorite part of the Faire?
I love watching the jousting tournaments.
Those are always fun to watch! I'm always amazed at how skilled the knights are.
Me too! They're incredible.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love swimming! It's a great way to start my day.
I agree! Swimming is so relaxing. I used to swim competitively when I was younger.
That's awesome! I've always been a bit of a fish out of water, but I love swimming anyway.
I'm glad you enjoy it! I miss swimming competitively, but I'm still happy to get in the water whenever I can.
Me too! Swimming is the best.
I agree! It's a great way to stay active and have fun.
Definitely! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I think it's a great way to start a conversation.
Me too! I'm glad we're having this conversation
